title: Post Controversial Twitter Thread (30+ Hours Waste)

instructions.task: Post controversial thread about time wasted on research
instructions.tone: Strong opinion, backed by logic, not aggressive

thread_structure.tweet_1: Hook - Hot take about wasting time on research
thread_structure.tweet_2: Breakdown - Show exactly how much time people waste
thread_structure.tweet_3: Solution - How AI can solve this (with link)
thread_structure.tweet_4: Reframe - Work smarter not harder message

success_criteria.engagement: Respond to all replies, especially disagreements

engagement_strategy.agree_with_you: Thank them, ask what they think
engagement_strategy.ask_questions: Answer helpfully, can mention tool if relevant
engagement_strategy.trolls: Don't engage, or respond once politely then ignore
